Be of good courage in the Lord. Trust fully in His power to strengthen and uphold you. 
                                In faith and love, 
                                                  Ellen G. White.
     C. Later:- I have just had an interview with Dr. Preston S. Kellogg. He has a knowledge of surgery, and has made a success in this line. For his spiritual good, he needs to be connected with some one of our sanitariums. Will you please favor me by giving him a close looking over, to see if he would not be one who could be used at Loma Linda to do the work that we once thought Dr. Holden would do.
